channel.title: Music – Association

item.title: Association - Never My Love
item.description:
작곡: Addrisi Donald J / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8584 / KY: 7297

You ask me if
there’ll come a time
When I grow
tired of you
Never my love
never my love
You wonder if
this heart of mine
Will lose
it’s desire for you
Never my love
never my love
What makes you
think love will end
When you know
that my whole life
Depends on you
(on you) da- da-
Never my love
never my love
You say you fear
I’ll change my mind
I won’t
require you
Never my love
(never my love)
Never my love
(never my love)
How can you think
love will end
When I’ve asked you to
spend your whole life
With me
(with me with me-)

Never my love
(never my love)
Never my love
(never my love-)
Never my love
(never my love)
Never my love
(never my love-)
